About The Event

Join global experts in space science, satellite technology, and geospatial intelligence for three days of inspiring talks, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities at the most anticipated space technology event of the year. This years theme Beyond Horizons: Mapping the Future will explore breakthroughs in space exploration, Earth observation, and the integration of AI with geospatial technologies.
